message.body: I have to take Soraya to the dentist tomorrow. Do you need the car
I can't talk. What is going on
U said nothing about a therapy appointment. I was expecting to use the car now. I wish u had told me u wouldn't be back in time for me to use it so I could get going by bike earlier.

I am very sorry about that. I had texted you last night about the car and you said you didn't need it. I assumed that was all day. You didn't mention the need for the car in the evening and I completely forgot about your schedule. It is always changing. Hard to keep up with.
I understand. I'll try to be more specific next time. I don't mind biking but just to go earlier.
